title: Dedicated Administrative Assistant Needed (Hourly)
snippet: We are looking for a female administrative assistant to (virtually) support our company's newly hired independent contractors. The role involves collecting data via e-mail from our contractors, proof-reading what has been submitted, and entering it into our website. Our contractors prefer e-mail correspondences, however, we will assign a dedicated virtual phone number and a mailbox to help the administrative assistant serve our contractors.  English fluency (spoken and written) is a must.
